H turns out that farmers and

mortality composting for decades
mortality composting is where you take
an animal high in nitrogen and cover it
with co-composting materials that are
high in carbon it's an aerobic process
so it requires oxygen and it requires
plenty of moisture as well in the most
basic setup a cow is covered with a few
feet of wood chips which are high in
carbon and left outside for nature for
breezes to provide oxygen and Rain to
provide
moisture in about 9 months All That
Remains is a nutrient Rich
compost the flesh has been decomposed
entirely as have the
